players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Alice is dead. This is terrible. I don't know what happened, but we need to figure this out quickly. We lost a town member on the first night. We have to be careful and observant."
You: "Charlie, I agree. Losing Alice is a big blow. We should watch Diana closely—her silence is suspicious. Town needs to keep a close eye on everyone, but especially those who don't speak up."
Charlie: "I agree with Bob. Diana's silence is concerning, especially after Alice's death. We need to hear from everyone. If Diana has nothing to say, it makes her seem even more suspicious."
You: "Diana, your continued silence is really standing out. If you're town, now is the time to speak up and help us find the mafia before they strike again."
Diana: "Diana here. I investigated Bob last night, and he is the mafioso. I stayed silent to avoid giving him time to deflect or accuse me falsely. We must vote Bob out now."
